wine_description.prompt: Starting with a common short name for this wine, describe this wine in an exciting way and highlight how it is unique: {{wine_name}}. #

wine_popularity.prompt: In a memorable and exciting way, tell me what makes this wine so popular: {{wine_name}}. #

wine_fun_fact.prompt: Tell me something unique and funny about the winery which makes this wine, but don't talk about the wine name or wine label: {{wine_name}}. #

wine_history.prompt: Tell me about the origin story of this wine, including notable vintage years and important events: {{wine_name}}. #

wine_pairing.prompt: Tell me about the foods that go well with: {{wine_name}}. #

wine_style.prompt: Picking from this list of wine types: red wine, white wine, rose wine, sparkling wine, and dessert wine, which wine type does this wine belong to: {{wine_name}} ? #

wine_country.prompt: In three words or less, tell me the country name that this wine is from: {{wine_name}}. #
